named-native-query.name: Indicateur.countClientsDepassementEncours
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(rownum) FROM geo_pays p, geo_client c WHERE p.pay_code = c.pay_code AND p.sco_code like :arg_sco_code AND c.valide = 'O' AND COALESCE(c.enc_actuel, 0) - (COALESCE(c.enc_assure, 0) + COALESCE(c.enc_depasse, 0) + COALESCE(c.enc_bw, 0)) > 0 AND c.soc_code = :arg_soc_code AND p.valide = 'O' AND p.sco_code = c.sco_code

named-native-query.name: Indicateur.countOrdresNonConfirmes
named-native-query.query: SELECT count(DISTINCT o.ORD_REF) FROM geo_ordre o, GEO_ENVOIS e WHERE o.ORD_REF = e.ORD_REF(+) AND (e.TRAIT_EXP IS NULL OR e.TRAIT_EXP NOT IN ('N', 'O')) AND (e.FLU_CODE IS NULL OR e.FLU_CODE = 'ORDRE') AND o.facture_avoir = 'F' AND o.credat >= CURRENT_DATE AND o.valide = 'O' AND o.soc_code = :arg_soc_code AND o.sco_code like :arg_sco_code

named-native-query.name: Indicateur.countPlanningDepart
named-native-query.query: select count(rownum) from geo_ordre o, geo_ordlog olg where o.ord_ref = olg.ord_ref and olg.datdep_fou_p BETWEEN :arg_date_min AND :arg_date_max and o.valide = 'O' AND o.soc_code = :arg_soc_code AND o.sco_code like :arg_sco_code

named-native-query.name: Indicateur.countLitigeOuvert
named-native-query.query: SELECT count(rownum) FROM geo_litige l, geo_ordre o WHERE l.ORD_REF_ORIGINE = o.ORD_REF AND l.valide = 'O' AND (l.FL_CLIENT_CLOS = 'N' OR l.FL_FOURNI_CLOS = 'N') AND o.soc_code = :arg_soc_code AND o.sco_code LIKE :arg_sco_code
